author: Staff Reporter
text:
People who applied for a BJP ticket to contest from the eight constituencies in Tiruvannamalai district were interviewed here on Monday.

BJP former state president K.N. Lakshmanan and state secretary K.T. Ragavan interviewed the aspirants. Vellore Zonal Organisation Secretary of the party S. Gunasekaran said that in total 90 people applied for ticket. The interview reports would be sent to state leadership which would consider the reports before finalising the candidates, he added.
title: BJP ticket aspirants interviewed
